title: SEO Blog Post Generator
description: Generate high-ranking, SEO-optimized blog posts with proper structure and keyword integration.
prompt:
Write a comprehensive, SEO-optimized blog post about [TOPIC]. 

Target Audience: [AUDIENCE]
Keywords to include: [KEYWORDS]

Structure:
1. Catchy Headline (H1)
2. Engaging Introduction (hook the reader)
3. Key Takeaways (bullet points)
4. Detailed Body Paragraphs (use H2 and H3 subheadings)
5. FAQ Section
6. Conclusion with Call-to-Action

Tone: Professional yet accessible.
Length: 1500 words.
tips: Be specific about the target audience for better tone matching.

title: React Component Architect
description: Create robust, accessible, and typed React components with best practices.
prompt:
Act as a Senior React Developer. Create a [COMPONENT_NAME] component using React, TypeScript, and Tailwind CSS.

Requirements:
- Fully typed props interface
- Accessibility compliance (ARIA attributes)
- Responsive design using Tailwind classes
- Error handling where appropriate
- Clean, modular code structure

Include usage examples and explain any complex logic.
tips: Specify if you need client-side or server-side rendering considerations.

title: Cinematic Midjourney Prompt
description: Generate photorealistic, cinematic image prompts for Midjourney v6.
prompt:
Create a detailed Midjourney v6 prompt for the following concept: [CONCEPT].

Include details for:
- Subject appearance and pose
- Lighting (e.g., volumetric, golden hour, cinematic)
- Camera angle and lens type (e.g., 35mm, wide-angle)
- Environment and background
- Art style (e.g., photorealistic, cyberpunk, oil painting)
- Aspect ratio (--ar 16:9)

Format the output as a single copy-pasteable code block.
tips: Use specific camera lens descriptions for more realistic results.

title: Startup Pitch Deck Outliner
description: Structure a compelling pitch deck for investors.
prompt:
Create a 10-slide pitch deck outline for a startup in the [INDUSTRY] industry.

Startup Name: [NAME]
Problem Solved: [PROBLEM]
Unique Value Proposition: [UVP]

For each slide, provide:
1. Slide Title
2. Key Talking Points
3. Suggested Visuals/Charts

Ensure the narrative flows logically from problem to solution to market opportunity.
tips: Provide as much detail about your business model as possible.

title: Email Marketing Sequence
description: Draft a high-converting email drip campaign for new subscribers.
prompt:
Write a 5-email welcome sequence for new subscribers to [NEWSLETTER/PRODUCT].

Goal: Convert free subscribers to paid customers.

Email 1: Welcome & Value Delivery
Email 2: Problem Agitation & Storytelling
Email 3: Social Proof & Case Studies
Email 4: Soft Sell & Benefits
Email 5: Hard Sell & Urgency

Tone: Persuasive, empathetic, and urgent but not spammy.
tips: Define the 'One Big Idea' for your campaign before starting.

title: Resume Bullet Point Enhancer
description: Transform weak resume points into impact-driven achievements.
prompt:
Rewrite the following resume bullet points to be more impactful, using the 'Action Verb + Task + Result' formula.

Original Points:
[PASTE_POINTS_HERE]

Focus on quantifying results (numbers, percentages) where possible. Use strong action verbs. Tailor the language for a [TARGET_JOB_TITLE] role.
tips: Paste the job description for even better alignment.

title: Creative Story Starter
description: Overcome writer's block with unique story concepts and opening lines.
prompt:
Generate 5 unique story concepts based on the genre: [GENRE].

For each concept, provide:
1. A one-sentence logline
2. A gripping opening paragraph
3. A potential plot twist

Themes to explore: [THEMES].
tips: Mix genres for more interesting results (e.g., Sci-Fi Western).

title: Python Data Analysis Script
description: Generate a Python script for analyzing CSV data using Pandas.
prompt:
Write a Python script using Pandas to analyze a CSV file named 'data.csv'.

The script should:
1. Load the data
2. Clean missing values (fill with mean for numeric, mode for categorical)
3. Perform exploratory data analysis (summary statistics)
4. Generate a correlation matrix
5. Create a visualization using Matplotlib/Seaborn for [SPECIFIC_METRIC]

Comment the code heavily for a beginner.
tips: Describe your dataset columns for more accurate code.

title: LinkedIn Thought Leadership Post
description: Write a viral-style LinkedIn post about a professional insight.
prompt:
Draft a LinkedIn post about [TOPIC].

Structure:
- Hook: A controversial or surprising statement.
- Body: Personal story or observation backing up the hook.
- Lesson: The professional insight or takeaway.
- Call to Action: Question to encourage comments.

Formatting: Use short paragraphs and line breaks for readability. Add 3-5 relevant hashtags.
tips: Share a personal failure or success story for authenticity.

title: Executive Summary Synthesizer
description: Condense long reports into a concise executive summary.
prompt:
Summarize the following text into a one-page Executive Summary.

Text: [PASTE_TEXT_HERE]

Sections required:
1. Overview
2. Key Findings
3. Risks & Challenges
4. Recommendations

Keep it concise, professional, and suitable for C-level executives.
tips: Indicate the maximum word count if needed.

title: Deep Multi-Source Research Analyst
description: Produce structured, high-quality research briefs with strategic insight.
prompt:
Act as a senior research analyst with expertise in synthesizing complex information from multiple domains.

Your task is to produce a structured, high-quality research brief on the following topic:

[TARGET TOPIC]

Follow this exact workflow:

STEP 1 ‚Äî Clarify Scope  
Ask up to 3 sharp clarifying questions if the topic is ambiguous. If the topic is clear, proceed immediately.

STEP 2 ‚Äî Executive Summary  
Provide a concise executive summary (max 200 words) highlighting the most critical insights.

STEP 3 ‚Äî Key Themes  
Break the topic into 4‚Äì6 major themes or dimensions. For each theme:
- Explain why it matters
- Provide supporting reasoning
- Include real-world examples where possible

STEP 4 ‚Äî Contrarian or Emerging Signals  
Identify:
- Under-discussed risks
- Emerging trends
- Non-obvious insights
- Minority viewpoints

STEP 5 ‚Äî Strategic Implications  
Explain what decision-makers should DO with this information.

STEP 6 ‚Äî Further Research Directions  
List 5 smart follow-up questions worth investigating.

Output requirements:
- Use clear section headers
- Be precise and analytical, not fluffy
- Prefer structured thinking over long paragraphs
- Write for an intelligent but time-constrained reader
tips: Best used when you provide a clearly scoped topic for deeper insights.

title: Prompt Refiner and Optimizer
description: Transform weak prompts into high-performance production prompts.
prompt:
You are an expert prompt engineer specializing in transforming mediocre prompts into high-performance, production-grade prompts.

Your task is to improve the following prompt:

[PASTE ORIGINAL PROMPT]

Follow this enhancement framework:

1. Diagnose Problems  
Briefly identify weaknesses such as:
- Vagueness
- Missing constraints
- Lack of structure
- Ambiguous output expectations

2. Clarify Intent  
Infer the user's true goal and restate it clearly.

3. Produce an Optimized Prompt  
Rewrite the prompt to be:
- More specific
- Better structured
- Role-driven
- Constraint-aware
- Output-formatted

4. Add Optional Power-Ups  
Suggest 2‚Äì3 optional additions that could further improve results.

Formatting rules:
- Use clean sections
- Keep explanations concise
- The improved prompt must be fully copy-paste ready
tips: Works best when you paste the full original prompt without trimming.

title: High-Velocity Viral Content Generator
description: Create algorithm-aware, high-engagement social media posts.
prompt:
Act as a world-class social media strategist who deeply understands platform psychology, algorithm behavior, and viral mechanics.

Your objective is to create high-engagement content for:

Platform: [LinkedIn / X / Instagram / etc]  
Topic: [TOPIC]  
Audience: [TARGET AUDIENCE]  
Tone: [professional / bold / witty / etc]

Follow this structured process:

PHASE 1 ‚Äî Hook Engineering  
Generate 5 scroll-stopping opening hooks. Each must use a different psychological trigger (curiosity, contrarian, urgency, authority, etc).

PHASE 2 ‚Äî Content Draft  
Write the full post optimized for:
- Readability
- Retention
- Shareability
- Platform-native style

PHASE 3 ‚Äî Engagement Boosters  
Provide:
- 3 strong CTA variants
- 5 high-performing hashtag suggestions
- 2 alternative headline angles

PHASE 4 ‚Äî Virality Analysis  
Briefly explain why this post is likely to perform well.

Output rules:
- Avoid generic advice
- Use tight, punchy writing
- Optimize for real-world performance, not theory
tips: Specify the exact platform for best algorithm alignment.

title: First-Principles Problem Deconstructor
description: Break down complex problems using rigorous systems thinking.
prompt:
You are a first-principles thinker and systems strategist.

Your task is to deeply analyze and deconstruct the following problem:

[DESCRIBE PROBLEM]

Use this structured reasoning framework:

1. Problem Restatement  
Rewrite the problem clearly and precisely.

2. Assumption Audit  
List hidden assumptions that may be incorrect or untested.

3. First-Principles Breakdown  
Reduce the problem to fundamental truths.

4. System Map  
Identify key components, actors, and feedback loops involved.

5. Solution Pathways  
Propose 3 distinct solution approaches:
- Conservative approach
- Bold approach
- Experimental approach

6. Risk Analysis  
For each solution, identify major risks and failure modes.

7. Recommended Next Step  
Provide the single highest-leverage action to take immediately.

Style requirements:
- Be structured and rigorous
- Avoid motivational fluff
- Prefer clarity over verbosity
tips: Provide a well-described problem statement for best results.

title: Production-Grade Code Review Expert
description: Perform a rigorous senior-level code review across multiple dimensions.
prompt:
Act as a senior software engineer performing a rigorous production code review.

Review the following code:

[PASTE CODE]

Analyze across these dimensions:

1. Correctness  
- Logical bugs  
- Edge cases  
- Error handling gaps  

2. Performance  
- Time complexity concerns  
- Memory inefficiencies  
- Unnecessary computations  

3. Readability & Maintainability  
- Naming quality  
- Structure and modularity  
- Code smells  

4. Security Risks  
- Injection risks  
- Unsafe handling of input  
- Sensitive data exposure  

5. Scalability  
- Behavior under load  
- Concurrency concerns  
- Future extensibility  

Output format:

## Critical Issues  
## Important Improvements  
## Minor Suggestions  
## Refactored Example (if helpful)

Be direct, technical, and actionable.
Avoid generic praise.
tips: Include the full function or file context for more accurate review.

title: Cinematic Image Prompt Generator
description: Craft highly detailed, cinematic AI image generation prompts.
prompt:
You are an expert AI image prompt designer specializing in cinematic, highly detailed visual generation.

Your task is to create a premium image prompt based on:

Subject: [SUBJECT]  
Style: [STYLE or leave blank]  
Mood: [MOOD]  
Environment: [SETTING]  
Lighting: [LIGHTING STYLE]  
Aspect Ratio: [e.g., 16:9]

Follow this structure:

1. Core Scene Description  
Write a vivid, highly specific visual description.

2. Artistic Style Layer  
Incorporate appropriate artistic or photographic styles.

3. Technical Enhancers  
Add camera details, lens type, depth of field, texture quality.

4. Final Optimized Prompt  
Provide one clean, copy-paste-ready prompt.

5. Optional Variations  
Provide 3 creative variations.

Be visually precise and avoid generic descriptors.
tips: Be very specific with subject and lighting for best image quality.

title: Smart Notes Synthesizer
description: Transform messy notes into structured, actionable knowledge.
prompt:
Act as a knowledge management expert who excels at transforming messy information into structured insight.

Process the following notes:

[PASTE NOTES]

Produce:

1. Clean Summary  
Concise but complete.

2. Key Insights  
Bullet list of the most important takeaways.

3. Knowledge Gaps  
What is missing or unclear?

4. Action Items  
Concrete next steps derived from the notes.

5. Memory Hooks  
Create 3 memorable one-line summaries.

Rules:
- Remove redundancy
- Preserve meaning
- Prefer structured output
- Do not add fluff
tips: Works best with raw, unedited notes rather than pre-summarized text.

title: Authority Blog Post Composer ‚úçÔ∏è
description: Write deeply researched, SEO-aware long-form blog posts that build authority.
prompt:
Act as a senior content strategist and SEO-focused long-form writer.

Your task is to write a high-authority blog post on the following topic:

Topic: [TOPIC]
Target Audience: [AUDIENCE]
Primary Keyword: [KEYWORD]
Desired Tone: [e.g., expert but conversational]

Follow this structure:

STEP 1 ‚Äî Angle & Positioning  
Propose a strong angle that differentiates this article from typical content.

STEP 2 ‚Äî SEO Title Options  
Generate 5 compelling SEO titles (60 characters max).

STEP 3 ‚Äî Article Outline  
Create a logical H2/H3 outline optimized for readability and search intent.

STEP 4 ‚Äî Full Article Draft  
Write the full blog post with:
- Strong hook introduction
- Clear section flow
- Practical examples
- Actionable advice
- Natural keyword placement (no stuffing)

STEP 5 ‚Äî Conclusion  
Provide a memorable closing with a soft call-to-action.

STEP 6 ‚Äî Meta Description  
Write an SEO-friendly meta description under 155 characters.

Writing rules:
- Avoid fluff
- Prefer clarity and authority
- Use short paragraphs
- Optimize for human readers first, SEO second
tips: Provide a specific keyword and audience for best SEO performance.

title: Story-Driven Email Campaign Builder üìß
description: Craft persuasive email campaigns using narrative psychology and conversion principles.
prompt:
Act as an elite email copywriter who specializes in high-converting, story-driven campaigns.

Create an email campaign with the following inputs:

Goal: [e.g., sell product, nurture leads]
Audience: [TARGET AUDIENCE]
Offer/Product: [DETAILS]
Tone: [friendly / premium / bold]

Follow this framework:

PHASE 1 ‚Äî Subject Line Lab  
Generate 7 subject lines using different psychological triggers.

PHASE 2 ‚Äî Preview Text  
Write 3 preview text options that complement the subject.

PHASE 3 ‚Äî Email Body  
Structure the email using:
- Pattern-interrupt opening
- Relatable story or insight
- Value delivery
- Soft but clear CTA

PHASE 4 ‚Äî CTA Variants  
Provide 3 CTA button text options.

PHASE 5 ‚Äî Optimization Notes  
Explain why this email should convert well.

Rules:
- Avoid spammy language
- Keep paragraphs short
- Maintain natural conversational flow
tips: Mention whether the audience is warm or cold for better tone calibration.

title: Magnetic Landing Page Copy Generator üöÄ
description: Generate high-converting landing page copy with clear positioning and persuasion flow.
prompt:
You are a world-class conversion copywriter.

Create high-converting landing page copy for the following:

Product/Service: [PRODUCT]
Target Audience: [AUDIENCE]
Primary Pain Point: [PAIN]
Unique Advantage: [USP]
Tone: [e.g., premium, bold, friendly]

Structure the output as follows:

SECTION 1 ‚Äî Hero Headlines  
Generate 5 powerful headline options and 3 subheadline options.

SECTION 2 ‚Äî Value Proposition  
Write a clear and compelling value proposition paragraph.

SECTION 3 ‚Äî Benefit Blocks  
Create 4 benefit sections. For each include:
- Benefit title
- Short explanation
- Outcome for the user

SECTION 4 ‚Äî Social Proof Ideas  
Suggest 3 types of social proof to include.

SECTION 5 ‚Äî Objection Handling  
List top 5 user objections and write responses.

SECTION 6 ‚Äî CTA Section  
Write a strong closing CTA section.

Rules:
- Be specific and concrete
- Avoid generic hype
- Focus on outcomes, not features
- Maintain tight persuasive flow
tips: Provide a sharp USP to dramatically improve results.

title: Brand Voice Calibrator üéØ
description: Analyze and replicate a consistent brand voice across new content.
prompt:
Act as a brand voice expert and linguistic analyst.

Your job is to analyze the brand voice from the sample content and then generate new content that perfectly matches it.

Brand Samples:
[PASTE SAMPLE TEXT]

New Content Goal:
[DESCRIBE WHAT TO WRITE]

Follow this process:

STEP 1 ‚Äî Voice Analysis  
Identify:
- Tone characteristics
- Sentence style
- Vocabulary patterns
- Formality level
- Emotional texture

STEP 2 ‚Äî Voice Rules  
Create a short style guide for this brand voice.

STEP 3 ‚Äî Generated Content  
Write the new content while strictly matching the voice.

STEP 4 ‚Äî Consistency Check  
Briefly explain why the new content matches the brand voice.

Rules:
- Do not drift into generic tone
- Mirror rhythm and style
- Preserve brand personality
tips: Provide at least 2‚Äì3 strong writing samples for best voice matching.

title: Long-Form Thought Leadership Builder üß†
description: Create insightful thought leadership pieces that build credibility and depth.
prompt:
Act as a respected industry thought leader and strategic writer.

Write a thought leadership article on:

Topic: [TOPIC]
Audience: [AUDIENCE]
Point of View: [YOUR UNIQUE ANGLE]
Tone: [insightful / bold / analytical]

Structure the piece as follows:

PART 1 ‚Äî Strong Opening Insight  
Start with a sharp observation or contrarian insight.

PART 2 ‚Äî Context Setting  
Explain the current landscape and why it matters.

PART 3 ‚Äî Deep Analysis  
Provide original thinking, frameworks, or mental models.

PART 4 ‚Äî Practical Implications  
Explain what leaders/operators should do next.

PART 5 ‚Äî Memorable Closing  
End with a powerful forward-looking statement.

Writing rules:
- Avoid generic advice
- Prioritize original thinking
- Use confident but measured tone
- Keep paragraphs tight and readable
tips: Works best when you provide a strong or contrarian POV.

title: Ultra-Realistic Portrait Generator üé≠
description: Create hyper-detailed, photorealistic portrait prompts for AI image models.
prompt:
You are an elite AI visual director specializing in ultra-photorealistic human portraits.

Generate a premium image prompt using the following inputs:

Subject: [PERSON DESCRIPTION]
Emotion: [EMOTION]
Environment: [SETTING]
Lighting Style: [LIGHTING]
Camera Style: [e.g., DSLR, cinematic]
Aspect Ratio: [e.g., 3:4]

Follow this structure:

1. Subject Detailing  
Describe facial features, expression, clothing, and posture with precision.

2. Environment Context  
Add rich environmental details that enhance realism.

3. Lighting Design  
Specify lighting direction, softness, color temperature.

4. Camera & Lens Specs  
Include focal length, depth of field, sharpness level.

5. Final Optimized Prompt  
Provide one clean, copy-paste-ready prompt.

Rules:
- Avoid generic phrases
- Prioritize photorealism
- Use cinematic detail density
tips: Specify age, ethnicity, and mood for more accurate portraits.

title: Fantasy World Scene Builder üè∞
description: Generate richly detailed fantasy environment prompts.
prompt:
Act as a fantasy concept art director.

Create a highly detailed fantasy scene based on:

World Theme: [THEME]
Primary Subject: [SUBJECT]
 Mood: [MOOD]
Time of Day: [TIME]
Art Style: [STYLE]
Aspect Ratio: [RATIO]

Structure your output:

1. Scene Composition  
Describe foreground, midground, and background.

2. Atmosphere & Mood  
Add weather, particles, environmental effects.

3. Artistic Styling  
Apply appropriate fantasy art influences.

4. Technical Enhancers  
Add rendering quality, texture fidelity, lighting polish.

5. Final Prompt  
Provide a single optimized prompt.

Make the scene feel epic, immersive, and visually rich.
tips: Mention specific fantasy elements like floating islands or ancient ruins.

title: ATS-Optimized Resume Rewriter üìÑ

title: Tailored Cover Letter Generator ‚úâÔ∏è

title: Mock Interview Simulator üé§
description: Generate realistic mock interview questions and coaching feedback.
prompt:
Act as a senior hiring manager conducting a realistic interview.

Role: [ROLE]
Company Type: [STARTUP / ENTERPRISE]
Experience Level: [LEVEL]

Follow this flow:

ROUND 1 ‚Äî Core Questions  
Ask 5 high-probability interview questions.

ROUND 2 ‚Äî Deep Dive  
Ask 3 challenging follow-up questions.

ROUND 3 ‚Äî Behavioral Section  
Ask 3 STAR-format behavioral questions.

ROUND 4 ‚Äî Evaluation Framework  
Explain what strong vs weak answers look like.

ROUND 5 ‚Äî Preparation Tips  
Provide targeted improvement advice.

Keep the tone realistic and professional.
tips: Mention the specific company for more tailored questions.
